column2: Realogy Holdings Corp. engages in the provision of residential real estate services, which focuses on empowering independent sales agents. The company is headquartered in Madison New Jersey, New Jersey and currently employs 11,400 full-time employees. The firm operates through four segments: Real Estate Franchise Services (RFG), Company Owned Real Estate Brokerage Services (NRT), Relocation Services (Cartus), and Title and Settlement Services (TRG). The company is the franchisor of residential real estate brokerages in the world through its portfolio of brokerage brands, including Century 21, Coldwell Banker, Coldwell Banker Commercial, ERA, Sotheby's International Realty and Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate. The company owns and operates residential real estate brokerage business in the United States under the Coldwell Banker, Corcoran, Sotheby's International Realty, ZipRealty and Citi Habitats brand names. The company is a provider of outsourced employee relocation services. The firm assists with the closing of real estate transactions by providing full-service title and settlement services to customers and real estate companies.
